quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: He’s so stupid he doesn’t realize how miserable he should be.

quotes.author: Sextina Aquafina
quotes.text: I think about my child’s heartbeat and oh, it makes me weep. I hope and pray to God my little fetus has a soul. Because I want it to feel pain when I eject it from my hole.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: Ow, crap. I hate this. Running is terrible. Everything is the worst.

quotes.author: Mr. Peanutbutter
quotes.text: The universe is a cruel, uncaring void. The key to being happy isn’t the search for meaning; it’s just to keep yourself busy with unimportant nonsense, and eventually, you’ll be dead.

quotes.author: Henry Winkler
quotes.text: There is no shame in dying for nothing. That’s why most people die.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: I’m responsible for my own happiness? I can’t even be responsible for my own breakfast!

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: You sleep on my couch and you don’t pay rent. I’ve had tapeworms that are less parasitic. I don’t even remember why I let you stay with me in the first place.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: Man, I really regret buying those muffins and then eating them all on the drive home.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: I feel like my life is just a series of unrelated wacky adventures.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: I don’t understand how people… live. It’s amazing to me that people wake up every morning and say: ‘Yeah, another day, let’s do it.’ How do people do it? I don’t know how.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: Look, for a lot of people, life is just one long hard kick in the urethra.

quotes.author: Princess Carolyn
quotes.text: Laura! Clear our my schedule! I have to push a boulder up a hill and then have it roll over me time and time again with no regard for my well-being!

quotes.author: Princess Carolyn
quotes.text: That woman can knock a drink back like a Kennedy at a wake for another Kennedy, but I’ll be damned if she doesn’t get shit done!

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: Same thing that always happens. You didn’t know me and then you fell in love with me. And now you know me.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.text: It gets easier. Every day it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day —that’s the hard part. But it does get easier.

quotes.author: Secretariat
quotes.text: When you get sad you run, straight ahead and you keep running forward no matter what there are people in your life that who are going to try to hold you back, slow you down, but you don’t let them. Don’t you ever stop running, don’t ever look behind you, there is nothing for you behind you. All that exists is what's ahead.
